channel.title: Model Library on mrgsolve
channel.description: Recent content in Model Library on mrgsolve

item.title: Access Models in the Internal Library
item.description: library(mrgsolve) library(dplyr) PK model Here, we name the name of the model we want from the library (pk2cmt) and we point mread to the project directory where the internal model library is stored. This internal library is located wherever mrgsolve is installed. The install location for mrgsolve is not obvious, so we provide a function (modlib) that returns the currect path to the model library. mod <- mread("pk2cmt", modlib()) mod %>% ev(amt=100,rate=3,addl=4,ii=48,cmt=2) %>% mrgsim(end=320) %>% plot(CP~.
